author: Alex Brown
text:
A recent article states that 60 percent of respondents to a survey on Government Technology believe that the government procurement process is stifling innovation (http://bit.ly/Iw2L5X). 
This past Fall, ICMA worked with a coalition of organizations to help push for the repeal of a 3% withholding requirement on government payments, including to most contractors and certain grants. 
http://icma.org/en/Page/100279/3_Withholding_Requirement
Despite this success, what issues remain a challenge in the local government procurement process?
title: Challenges in Procurement
